General.Name: Ningxia Building Materials Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningxia Building Materials Group Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells cement, cement clinkers, ready-made concrete, and aggregates in China. The company is also involved in the digital logistics business. Its products are mainly used in roads, railways, bridges, other infrastructure, and real estate construction. The company was formerly known as Ningxia Saima Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningxia Building Materials Group Co.,Ltd in December 2011. Ningxia Building Materials Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Yinchuan, China.

2.Name: Mr. Xiong  Wu
2.Title: VP and Sec. of the Board of Directors
